title: Generative AI-Enhanced Assessment Design in Online Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts and Experience with Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Microlearning-based curriculum utilizing mobile devices in blended learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically evaluate mathematical problem-solving strategies presented in online discussions using generative AI.
Learners can analyze differences between AI-generated and human-generated content and document reflections in learning journals.
Learners can propose at least three ethical strategies for using generative AI tools in project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
